title: Zucchini Noodle Bacon Cacio d Pepe
ingredients: ¼ cup parmiganio reggiano cheese (or finely grated parmesan)
directions: Spiralize the 3 zucchini into noodle like chaos (using a C blade). Set aside. p/ Cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat. Place pieces on a paper towel lined plate. Remove all but 2 tbsp of bacon grease and return to heat. p/ Add zucchini noodles and garlic, cook for 2-3 minutes. Season zucchini with 5-7 large cracks of black pepper. p/ Remove from heat and add the majority of the parmiganio reggiano, 2 pieces of crumbled bacon, and allow to melt together. Season with salt and more pepper if desired. p/ Divide between two bowls and garnish with remaining cheese and bacon. /p Serving size: ½ of total yield /p Calories 215/serving
